actions.name: Wail
actions.description: The banshee lets out a wail. Each creature within 60m that can hear the wail must make DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save a creature is frightened for 1 minute.

features.name: Barrier
features.description: As an action or bonus action, the banshee gains 20 barrier ticks. When the banshee is dealt damage, if it has any barrier ticks remaining, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.

legendaryActions.name: Cast a Spell
legendaryActions.description: The banshee casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendaryActions.name: Impale Attack
legendaryActions.description: The banshee uses its imaple attack.

reactions.name: Teleporting Dodge
reactions.description: In response to making a Dexterity saving throw, the banshee can use its reaction to teleport up to 4m away. If it is still within the affected area, it has advantage on the saving throw.
